Installation¶

PodGen can be used on any system (if not: file a bug report!), and officially supports Python 2.7 and 3.3, 3.4, 3.5 and 3.6.

Use pip:

$ pip install podgen

Just a word of warning: PodGen depends on lxml, which can take several minutes to build.

Remember to use a virtual environment!
